unit.name: Forest Prince
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Accurate, Lightning Reflexes

unit.name: Chieftain
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Lightning Reflexes

unit.name: Druid
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Tree Singing, Lightning Reflexes

unit.name: Treefather Ancient
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 75x50 mm, Treefather Ancient, Forest Walker, Stubborn, Sylvan Spirit, Tree Singing, Aegis (5+), Flammable, Crush Attack, Impaling Roots (4+)

unit.name: Avatar of Nature
unit.description: single model, 0-1 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 75x50 mm, Forest Walker, Stubborn, Sylvan Spirit, Tree Singing, Aegis (5+), Flammable, Crush Attack, Impaling Roots (3+)

unit.name: Dryad Ancient
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm, Forest Walker, Sylvan Spirit, Tree Singing, Aegis (5+), Hatred

unit.name: Thicket Shepherd
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, A Shepherd and its Flock, Emboldening Boughs, Forest Walker, Sylvan Spirit, Aegis (5+), Flammable

unit.name: Forest Guard
unit.description: 15-50 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Scoring, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes

unit.name: Sylvan Archers
unit.description: 10-30 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Scoring, Lightning Reflexes, Sylvan Longbow (3+)

unit.name: Heath Riders
unit.description: 5-15 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Forest Walker, Scoring, Light Armour, Heath Rider: Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Lightning Reflexes, Sylvan Lance, Elven Horse: Harnessed

unit.name: Dryads
unit.description: 8-26 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x25 mm, Forest Walker, Sylvan Spirit, Aegis (5+)

unit.name: Forest Rangers
unit.description: 10-30 models, 0-5 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Fearless, Forest Walker, Scoring, Elven Cloak, Light Armour, Lightning Reflexes, Great Weapon

unit.name: Thicket Beasts
unit.description: 4-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Bodyguard (Thicket Shepherd), Emboldening Boughs, Forest Walker, Scoring, Sylvan Spirit, Aegis (5+), Flammable

unit.name: Forest Eagles
unit.description: 1-5 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Beast, Base 50x50 mm, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Strider (Forest)

unit.name: Blade Dancers
unit.description: 7-15 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Dances of Cenyrn, Fearless, Forest Walker, Light Troops, Aegis (6+), Hard Target (1), Magic Resistance (1), Lightning Reflexes, Sylvan Blades

unit.name: Treefather
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 75x50 mm, Forest Walker, Stubborn, Sylvan Spirit, Tree Singing, Aegis (5+), Flammable, Crush Attack, Impaling Roots (3+)

unit.name: Wild Huntsmen
unit.description: 5-12 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Fearless, Forest Walker, Frenzy, Light Troops, Aegis (6+), Light Armour, Wild Huntsman: Battle Focus, Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Lightning Reflexes, Elven Deer: Harnessed

unit.name: Kestrel Knights
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 40x40 mm, Feigned Flight, Fly (9", 18"), Forest Walker, Light Troops, Vanguard, Hard Target (1), Light Armour, Kestrel Knight: Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Lightning Reflexes, Sylvan Lance, Kestrel: Harnessed

unit.name: Briar Maidens
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Forest Walker, Light Troops, Wizard Conclave, Aegis (4+), Briar Maiden: Lightning Reflexes, Poison Attacks, Poisoned Thorn (2+), Elven Deer: Harnessed

unit.name: Sylvan Sentinels
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-2 Units/Army (0-1 Units/Army if the Army List includes 2+ units of Pathfinders), Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Lightning Reflexes, Poison Attacks, Sylvan Longbow (3+)

unit.name: Pathfinders
unit.description: 5-10 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Forest Walker, Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Lightning Reflexes, Master Archer, Sylvan Blades, Sylvan Longbow (2+)

mount.name: Elven Horse
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Elven Horse with Light Troops
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Harnessed, Light Troops

mount.name: Great Elk
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Sylvan Unicorn
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Cavalry, Base 25x50 mm, Aegis (+1, max. 4+), Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP), Harnessed, Magical Attacks

mount.name: Eagle King
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Cavalry, Base 50x50 mm, Fly (9", 18"), Light Troops, Hard Target (1), Harnessed

mount.name: Dragon
mount.description: 0-1 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Harnessed

item.name: The Forest Follows
item.description: Right after determining who deploys first (after step 1 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), you must place a single Forest Terrain Feature: - Entirely within your half of the Battlefield - Not in contact with any other Terrain Feature except Open Terrain - More than 6" away from the centre of the board when playing Hold the Ground, and more than 6" away from any marker used for the Secondary Objective. If both players are fielding Sylvan Elves, the player that selected their Deployment Zone places their Forest first. This Terrain Feature may not be larger than 27 cm in length and 19 cm in width. All Forests on the Battlefield are considered Dangerous Terrain (1) for all units except those with Strider or Strider (Forest).

item.name: Emboldening Boughs
item.description: A unit with more than half of its models with Emboldening Boughs gains Stubborn while more than half of the units models are inside a Forest with the centre of their bases.

item.name: Forest Walker
item.description: The model gains Strider (Forest). If a unit comprised entirely of models with Forest Walker starts a Round of Combat with more than half of its models with the centre of their bases inside a Forest, then all model parts without Harnessed must reroll to-wound rolls of 1 with their Close Combat Attacks for the duration of that Round of Combat.

item.name: Sylvan Spirit
item.description: The model gains Fearless and Magical Attacks. Models with Sylvan Spirit can only join or be joined by models with Sylvan Spirit.

item.name: Tree Singing
item.description: Each model with Tree Singing may discard 1 Veil Token once per friendly Magic Phase, right after Siphon the Veil. If so, choose a Forest Terrain Feature within 24" of the model with Tree Singing that is not in contact with any unit. Move this Forest in a straight line up to 6". This movement stops just before moving into contact with any units or any Terrain Features other than Open Terrain. Each Forest may only be moved with Tree Singing once per Magic Phase.

item.name: Master Archer
item.description: Shooting. When shooting with a Sylvan Longbow, all models with Master Archer in a unit may choose to gain either +2 Armour Penetration or +2 to hit.

item.name: Elven Cloak
item.description: Armour Equipment. When combined with Light Armour, the wearer gains +1 Armour. Elven Cloaks cannot be enchanted.

item.name: Impaling Roots
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 12", Shots D6+1, Str 4, AP 1, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire, ignores to-hit modifiers from Cover. If its target is in contact with a Forest, the Strength is set to 5 and Armour Penetration to 2.

item.name: Sylvan Longbow
Sylvan Longbow (0+)
Sylvan Longbow (1+)
Sylvan Longbow (2+)
Sylvan Longbow (3+)
Sylvan Longbow (4+)
Sylvan Longbow (5+)
Skirmisher and Sylvan Longbow (3+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. 0-55 Models with Sylvan Longbow per Army. Follows the rules for Longbows. In addition, attacks made with a Sylvan Longbow gain Armour Penetration 1 and Quick to Fire. Also, when shooting from Short Range, their Strength is set to 4.

item.name: Sylvan Blades
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Follows the rules for Paired Weapons. In addition, attacks made with Sylvan Blades gain +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Sylvan Lance
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Follows the rules for Light Lances. In addition, attacks made with a Sylvan Lance gain +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Shapeshifter
item.description: Models on foot only. The models Advance Rate is set to 6" and its March Rate is set to 18". It gains +1 Attack Value, +1 Resilience, Fear, Hard Target (1), Swiftstride, and Vanguard. The model may never join units or be joined by other Characters.

item.name: Wild Hunter
item.description: Models mounted on Elven Horse or Great Elk only. The bearers model gains +1 Attack Value, -2 Defensive Skill, Battle Focus, Devastating Charge (+1 Att, Fear), Fearless, Frenzy, and Light Troops.

item.name: Pathfinder
item.description: 0-2 per Army. Models on foot only. Cannot be taken by the Battle Standard Bearer. The model gains Master Archer and Scout. The Shots of a Sylvan Longbow wielded by the model are set to 3. If wielded by a Forest Prince, its Shots are set to 4 instead.

item.name: Blade Dancer
item.description: Models on foot only. The model gains Aegis (6+), Dances of Cenyrn (see Blade Dancer unit), and Fearless. The bearers unit gains Swiftstride. The model may only join or be joined by other Blade Dancer Kindred Characters and units of Blade Dancers. It cannot use any Shooting Weapons nor benefit from Armour (neither mundane nor enchanted).

item.name: Forest Guardian
item.description: Models on foot only. The model gains +1 Attack Value and +1 Armour.

item.name: Scarred Bark
item.description: All Dryads in the bearers unit gain Hatred.

item.name: Toxic Spores
item.description: The bearers unit gains Lethal Strike.

item.name: Entangling Vines
item.description: In a Duel, opponents must reroll successful to-hit rolls against the bearer.

item.name: Oaken Crown
item.description: The bearer gains Swift Reform.

item.name: Lifeseed Feathers
item.description: Enchantment: Sylvan Longbow. Attacks made with this weapon become Magical Attacks. Instead of firing this Sylvan Longbow using the standard rules for Sylvan Longbows and Longbows, the wielder may apply the following rules: Range 30", Shots always 1, Strength and Armour Penetration vary depending on the wielders distance to the target: - Str 4, AP 1 if within 10" - Str 5, AP 2 if more than 10" and within 20" - Str 6, AP 3 if more than 20" and within 30", and the attack gains Multiple Wounds (2)

item.name: Hunters Honour
item.description: Enchantment: Spear. Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and become Magical Attacks. If the wielder causes at least one unsaved wound with this weapon, the wielder and all R&F models in the wielders unit gain Distracting until the end of the Melee Phase.

item.name: Bough of Wyscan
item.description: Enchantment: Sylvan Longbow. Attacks made with this Sylvan Longbow gain +1 to wound when shooting from Short Range, and become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Spirit of the Whirlwind
item.description: Enchantment: Sylvan Blades. The bearer gains +1 Attack Value, and attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength, Lethal Strike, and become Magical Attacks.

item.name: Shielding Bark
item.description: Infantry models only. Enchantment: Light Armour. The wearer gains +1 Armour, Aegis (5+), Fearless, Flammable, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Curse of the Black Stag
item.description: Enchantment: Light Armour. The bearer gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 Def ).

item.name: Banner of Deception
item.description: At the end of step 4 of the Deployment Phase Sequence (before deploying Scouts), the owner may remove the bearers unit from the Battlefield and deploy it again elsewhere (any Characters joined to the unit must remain in the unit; this does not affect the number of Undeployed Units for calculating the starting roll-off bonus).

item.name: Predator Pennant
item.description: The bearers unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting).

item.name: Banner of Silent Mist
item.description: 0-2 per Army. The bearers unit gains Soft Cover. Enemy units within 3" of the bearers unit may not gain any benefit from a Musician.

item.name: Hail Shot
item.description: Forest Princes and Chieftains only. One use only. When this Artefact is used, it is a Shooting Weapon with the following profile: Range 30", Shots 3D6, Str 4, AP 1, Magical Attacks. Aim is set to 2+. When fired from Short Range, it gains +1 Armour Penetration. Master Archer cannot be used in conjunction with Hail Shot.

item.name: Mist Walkers Mirror
item.description: Models on foot only. One use only. If the bearers unit consists entirely of Standard Height Infantry models, is unengaged, and is fully inside a Forest Terrain Feature that doesnt contain any enemy models, the unit may teleport to any other Forest Terrain Feature on the Battlefield. This special movement is resolved at the end of the owners Movement Phase. When teleporting, the unit must be placed fully inside the target Forest. It may appear in any legal formation but must follow the Unit Spacing rule. The unit counts as having performed a March Move.

item.name: Sacred Seeds
item.description: Models on foot only. One use only. The player may activate this Artefact at the end of any friendly Movement Phase and place a Forest Terrain Feature in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from any enemy units and other Terrain Features. The Forest must fit within a circle with a diameter of 6".

item.name: Horn of the Wild Hunt
item.description: One use only. May be activated when a friendly unit within 8" fails a roll for Charge Range. The roll may be rerolled.

item.name: Glyph of Amryl
item.description: Cannot be taken by models with Sylvan Spirit. The bearer gains Cannot be Stomped. When fighting a Duel, the bearer gains +3 Defensive Skill.

item.name: Drums of Cenyrn
item.description: Models on foot only. One use only. May be activated when the bearers unit declares a Charge. The target of the Charge may only declare Hold as its Charge Reaction unless it is already Fleeing. The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if it is subsequently Charged by other units.

item.name: A Shepherd and its Flock
item.description: Universal Rule. The model cannot join a unit that contains another model with this rule.

item.name: Spear and Shield
item.description: - Shield: +1 Armour - Spear: Attacks made with a Spear gain Fight in Extra Rank and +1 Armour Penetration. Attacks made with a Spear gain +2 Agility and an additional +1 Armour Penetration in the First Round of Combat provided the attacking models unit is not Charging and is not Engaged either in its Flank or Rear Facing. Only Infantry can use Spears.

item.name: Elven Cloak and Sylvan Blades
item.description: - Elven Cloak: Armour Equipment. When combined with Light Armour, the wearer gains +1 Armour. Elven Cloaks cannot be enchanted. - Sylvan Blades: Close Combat Weapon. Follows the rules for Paired Weapons. In addition, attacks made with Sylvan Blades gain +1 Armour Penetration.

item.name: Heath Hunters
item.description: Universal Rule. The model loses Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) and Scoring, and gains Sylvan Longbow (3+), Feigned Flight, Light Troops, and Vanguard.

item.name: Clearing Spirits
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Skirmisher, Light Troops, and Hard Target (1).

item.name: Dances of Cenyrn
item.description: Universal Rule. At the start of each Round of Combat, units consisting entirely of models with this rule must choose one of the dances listed below and apply its effects until the end of the Round of Combat. The unit cannot choose this dance again until after one of the following has happened: - The unit is no longer Engaged in Combat. - The unit has chosen a different dance. - Dances: - Dance of Bedevilments: Fear, and enemy units in base contact with the model do not receive any Rank Bonus to their Combat Score. - Dance of Biting Wind: +1 Armour Penetration and Lethal Strike. - Dance of the Parting Mists: Aegis (3+), −1 Strength, and −1 Armour Penetration. - Dance of Whirling Blades: +1 Attack Value.

item.name: Poisoned Thorn
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 12", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 1, Quick to Fire.
